name: grocery story
description:
grocery story is all about getting your groceries while social distancing! Go to the grocery store (with a mask) and avoid other shoppers while completing your grocery list! Once you collect all the items, return to the check out counter to complete your quest. The grocery list changes every time so each play through is different!

CONTROLS

Use the SDF keys to turn Left and the JKL keys to turn right.

Use the Space Bar to push your grocery cart

Use the E and I keys to rotate your camera .

When your character's red circle is touching a white flashing object, use the Mouse and Left click on it to obtain the grocery item.
